item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

April 11, 2011's location is:

Thali - New Haven

If you're only a "Maybe", please put a comment in your RSVP.

SPECIALS:

- There will be some free appetizers

- Thali offers some high-end beers on draft, you can get them for $1 off the regular price

- $7 for a glass of wine

HOST: Jason, my cell is in my RSVP. Texting is fine too

PARKING: Street parking, or look at New Haven's parking garage/lot map here

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours.
Ever.

***Bring a friend***
item.how_to_find_us: You can contact the listed Host and/or we're most likely the largest group at the bar on a Monday.
item.name: Mon. 4/11 - Happy Hour at Thali Indian Restaurant
